item.title: Journal word counts over time
item.description: This is a project about international lawâ€™s history. Plot the results as points and smoothing line p <- ggplot(data = journals_count, mapping = aes(x = year, y = words, color = journal)) p + geom_point() + geom_smooth() ## `geom_smooth()` using method = 'loess' and formula 'y ~ x' Plot the results as a streamgraph: library(streamgraph) ## Registered S3 method overwritten by 'xts': ## method from ## as.
